SEARCH
Package seng201.team005.services

Class RaceService

java.lang.Object
seng201.team005.services.RaceService
public class RaceService extends Object
Service class for managing race-related functionality. Handles race events, entrant management, and race progression logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • RaceService

      public RaceService(MenuRaceController raceController, Race race, Route route, Car playerCar)
      Constructs a RaceService with the specified controller, race, route, and player's car.
      Parameters:
      raceController - The controller managing the race UI.
      race - The race instance being managed.
      route - The route on which the race is taking place.
      playerCar - The player's car participating in the race.

  • Method Details

    • getEntrantList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Entrant> getEntrantList()
      Returns:
      The list of all entrants participating in the race.

    • getPlayer

      public Entrant getPlayer()
      Returns:
      The player's entrant in the race.

    • getCurrentTime

      public int getCurrentTime()
      Returns:
      The current time step of the race.

      Returns:

    • getRoute

      Returns:
      The route on which the race is taking place.

    • calculatePrizeMoney

      public int calculatePrizeMoney()
      Calculates the prize money for the player based on their position.
      Returns:
      The prize money awarded to the player.

    • setCurrentPlayerEvent

      public void setCurrentPlayerEvent(RaceService.RaceEvent currentPlayerEvent)
      Sets the current event affecting the player's entrant and notifies the controller.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerEvent - The current event affecting the player.

    • carBreakDownChoice

      public void carBreakDownChoice(Entrant entrant, boolean payingForRepairs)
      Handles the player's choice during a car breakdown event.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant experiencing the breakdown.
      payingForRepairs - Whether the entrant is paying for repairs.

    • strandedTravelerChoice

      public void strandedTravelerChoice(Entrant entrant, boolean stopping)
      Handles the player's choice during a stranded traveler event.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant encountering the traveler.
      stopping - Whether the entrant stops to help.

    • fuelStopEvent

      public void fuelStopEvent(Entrant entrant)
      Handles a fuel stop event for an entrant.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant reaching the fuel stop.

    • fuelStopChoice

      public void fuelStopChoice(Entrant entrant, boolean stopping)
      Handles the player's choice during a fuel stop event.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant reaching the fuel stop.
      stopping - Whether the entrant stops to refuel.

    • randomEvent

      public void randomEvent(Entrant entrant)
      Triggers a random event for a specific entrant.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant for whom the event is triggered.

    • randomGlobalEvent

      public void randomGlobalEvent()
      Triggers a random global event affecting all entrants.

    • initEntrantList

      public void initEntrantList()
      Initializes the list of entrants for the race. Adds the player and generates AI entrants based on race difficulty.

    • driveStep

      public void driveStep(Entrant entrant)
      Simulates a single step of driving for an entrant. Updates their distance, fuel, and handles events like fuel stops.
      Parameters:
      entrant - The entrant taking the driving step.

    • timeStep

      public void timeStep()
      Simulates a single time step in the race. Updates entrant states, triggers events, and checks for race completion.
